Actions.Name: Side Cannons
Actions.Description: All foes in range 2 of the Wagon take fray damage and are shoved 1.

Actions.Name: Lumber
Actions.Description: Dash 2, then shove all adjacent foes 1.

Actions.Name: Torpedo
Actions.Description: The Battle Wagon summons a burrowing torpedo in a free space in range 6.

Summons.Name: Torpedo
Summons.SummonEffects: At the start of the wagon's next turn, the torpedo submerges, burrows, and detonates under the closest foe for a blast 1 area effect, destroying it. Foes in the area must save or take [D]+[fray], or [fray] damage on a successful save. Then, create a pit in the area. The torpedo deactivates if destroyed early.
